reviews.review: Ties ten years of characters, story and comic lore together in an amazing crexendo .

For anyone that has seen all the films, this one holds up as great as it could be. Thanos is a great villian, gets alot of screen time, and you care for him as a villian and makes the film that much better. Its an amazing film

i really like to see Thanos (Josh Brolin)  in the movies, the character have his soul, and i get to like watch the end of what is he doing till the end, makes me not boring because of his powerfull character as Thanos, i hope to like watch this movies again in the future. thanks to all crew who makes this movies, i am so entertained in my life, Thanos deserve an Oscar!

I saw Infinity Wars in 2D on Friday night at an AMC cinema and I was blown away ! MANY explosions rocked the theater both emotionally and with amazing special effects. So many of my favorite characters had hilarious meetings. I laughed; I cried; I was terrified; I cheered! The emotions were profound. I have never seen a more well acted CGI than the evil villain Thanos.  I LOVEc this movie!! GO THOR! I love you Gamorah. Rocket you are the cutest little rabbit I've ever seen and so feisty!! Love the girl power too with the Scarlet Witch and other powerful chicks!!

I never did follow comic books as a little kid, but I did borrow a roommate's comic books in undergraduate college.  They might have been "Secret Wars".  I remember what it was like to read an epic story involving epic superheroes locked in a drama of mythological proportions.  Avengers: Infinity War is the realization of that reading experience.  It hits just that right balance of drama and comedy, and the amazing special effects don't overshadow the characters.  It's all there, and it's perfection.
Overall was a great film, but there are several aspects that were not addressed and felt a bit too cut up and pasted together.
This film is a mess, confusing and complicated. The 11 years of MCU can be seen in this movie but the plot wasn't written at its best.
It's slow at the start, but once it gets going, Infinity War is a behemoth of an emotional ride to the finish.
The best Marvel movie to date! Awesome, intense, emotional and action packed! Well done! Thanos is one of the greatest villains in cinema!
